headline: Wells Fargo Names Saul Van Beurden to Lead Artificial Intelligence; Kleber Santos to Expand Responsibilities and Serve as Co-CEO of Consumer Banking and Lending with Van Beurden
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, November 20, 2025--Wells Fargo & Company today announced that Saul Van Beurden, currently CEO of Consumer and Small Business Banking, will lead Artificial Intelligence for the company.

raw.headline: Wells Fargo Names Saul Van Beurden to Lead Artificial Intelligence; Kleber Santos to Expand Responsibilities and Serve as Co-CEO of Consumer Banking and Lending with Van Beurden

headline: How Investors May Respond To Wells Fargo (WFC) Balancing Preferred Dividends With New Debt Issuances
summary: In recent days, Wells Fargo & Company declared quarterly dividends on six series of preferred stock and completed multiple fixed-income offerings, including new callable senior and subordinated notes with maturities from 2028 to 2040. The company also presented at an industry conference, where executives highlighted operational improvements and long-term strategic initiatives following strong quarterly results. An interesting development is Wells Fargo’s simultaneous focus on rewarding...

headline: Wells Fargo, Robinhood Top New Rankings for Digital Wealth Management
summary: New J.D. Power rankings of customer satisfaction with financial websites and apps credits top performers with sleek and intuitive designs that didn’t pile on too many features.
